Html: It looks like the DPS DK model status hasn't been updated for over a month and I was just wondering if it was ready and reliable to use yet?

Actually I've been making regular updates to the DK models, DPS & Tank. What status updates are you looking for?  I have made progress in improving the numbers, but it's still not more than partially complete since I don't have pet data more than very basic ghouls, but nothing else.  so UH is not complete, Frost is mostly minus ghouls/army.
I've updated the wiki page http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Rawr.DPSDK to include the changes that will be in the upcoming release.
